column1: '''''The Catholic Herald'' (18 September 1981)''' is an issue of the newspaper ''[[Wikipedia:The Catholic Herald
column2: The Catholic Herald]]''. The article "Letter by J.R.R. Tolkien is Rediscovered after 30 Years" includes extracts from [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column3: Tolkien]]'s [[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
